name: wcyho_app
description: A web application designed to simplify the process of coordinating casual hangouts by comparing schedules between friends.

scripts.netlify-build: cd project_folder/WhenCanYouHangOut && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd project_folder/WhenCanYouHangOut && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../project_folder/WhenCanYouHangOut && npm install
